txt.en:
Silvertine , two and twenty of the west side, middling.
Silvertine, six over piling on the west side, rich.
Commission for work on Hadâd-dûm expired, third June.
Records sent to Khadar-zarâm, Harâzgund, concerning lapse of rights in the exercise of construction for the arches.
Melkólf Stonecarver commissioned for detail work on rear wall of Rushdurinul during night-time for completion of Zurr-thurkh; special instructions withheld by order of Durin.
Redhorn, four and ten, middling.
Redhorn, five and ten, middling.
